title.narrative: Grant Funding of the Nike Foundation

description.narrative: This activity (Grant Funding of the Nike Foundation) is a component of DFID/Nike Foundation Girl Hub Project reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £13,463,408. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Women's equality organisations and institutions, Multisector aid. , with the following implementing partners: Nike Foundation. The start date is 01-07-2009 and the end date is 31-10-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
